# `{{ $frontmatter.title }}` for [default](/commands/categories/default.md)

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.default }}</div>


::: warning
The standard library is in alpha development stage. You can find more documentation on [GitHib](https://github.com/nushell/nushell/tree/main/crates/nu-std).
:::
## Signature

```> std input display {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--types, -t {list<string>}`: Listen for event of specified types only (can be one of: focus, key, mouse, paste, resize)
 -  `--raw, -r`: Add raw_code field with numeric value of keycode and raw_flags with bit mask flags


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Notes
Press escape to stop

To get individual events as records use "input listen"
